articles.content: Boeing is targeting March 25 for the launch of its commercial space capsule called Starliner’s second uncrewed flight test to prove the system is ready to fly crew missions for NASA to the Internatio… [+1461 chars]

articles.title: Tyrannosaurs—One of the Largest Dinosaurs—Birthed Babies the Size of Dalmatian Dogs, Study Finds | The Weather Channel - Articles from The Weather Channel | weather.com - The Weather Channel
articles.description: Their size makes them the largest hatchlings to ever emerge from eggs! But when compared to the ginormous adult tyrannosaurs, these babies were only slightly bigger than modern-day Dalmatians. - Articles from The Weather Channel | weather.com
articles.content: The tyrannosaur, which could grow up to 40 feet in length and weigh about eight tonnes, is one of the largest predators to have ever walked the face of planet Earth. In spite of its humongous size, h… [+2604 chars]

articles.author: ET Telecom
articles.title: Need a lift? SpaceX launches record spacecraft in cosmic rideshare program - ETTelecom.com
articles.description: The Falcon 9 rocket lifted off at 10 a.m. EST from the Space Launch Complex 40 at Cape Canaveral Space Force Station in Florida. It flew south along the eastern coast of Florida on its way to space, the company said.
articles.content: By Helen CosterA veteran rocket from billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk's SpaceX aerospace company launched 143 spacecraft into space on Sunday, a new record for the most spaceships deployed on a sin… [+1101 chars]
